org.apache.ignite.compute.gridify

Annotation Type GridifyInput


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
public @interface GridifyInput
    This annotation can be applied to method parameter for grid-enabled method. This annotation can be used when using when using annotations GridifySetToValue and GridifySetToSet. Note that annotations GridifySetToValue and GridifySetToSet can be applied to methods with a different number of parameters of the following types
    • java.util.Collection
    • java.util.Iterator
    • java.util.Enumeration
    • java.lang.CharSequence
    • java array
    If grid-enabled method contains several parameters with types described above then Ignite searches for parameters with GridifyInput annotation. Only one method parameter with GridifyInput annotation allowed.
    See Also:
    GridifySetToValue, GridifySetToSet
